guiSET.core

Class TextBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.TextBased
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Checkbox, Container, Label, ListItem, MenuItem

    public abstract class TextBased
extends Control
    Abstract base class for all components that display text. Implements the text drawing facilities.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen

      • copyStyle

        public void copyStyle(Control source,
                      long attribs)
        Description copied from class: Control
        Enable user of the library to adopt a set of visual style properties from another element. Call copyStyle(Control, attribs) to read given attributes (separated by bitwise OR) from given element c: myElement.copyStyle(otherElement, PADDING_LEFT | MARGIN_BOTTOM, FOREGROUND_COLOR);

        Options are: Control.PADDING_LEFT, Control.PADDING_RIGHT, Control.PADDING_TOP, Control.PADDING_BOTTOM, Control.MARGIN_LEFT, Control.MARGIN_RIGHT, Control.MARGIN_TOP, Control.MARGIN_BOTTOM, Control.BACKGROUND_COLOR, Control.HOVER_COLOR, Control.PRESSED_COLOR, Control.FOREGROUND_COLOR, Control.BORDER_WIDTH, Control.BORDER_RADIUS, Control.BORDER_COLOR, Control.OPACITY,

        Only if source and target have text properties: Control.TEXT_COLOR, Control.TEXT_ALIGN, Control.TEXT_ALIGN_Y, Control.FONT_SIZE, Control.LINE_HEIGHT.

        There some shortcuts to include several properties, like Control.ALL, Control.COLORS, Control.MARGIN (all margins), Control.PADDING (all paddings), Control.SPACING (all margins and paddings), Control.BACKGROUND_COLORS (background-, hover-, and pressedColor), Control.BORDER (border-width, -color and -radius), Control.TEXT_PROPERTIES (all text properties).
        Overrides:
        copyStyle in class Control
        Parameters:
        source - element to adopt properties from.
        attribs - bitwise OR added attributes
